content.description: Assume that mat has been declared as a <math alttext="4 by 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>Ã—</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> array of integers and has been initialized to contain all 1s. Consider the following code segment.
content.question: int n = mat.length; for (int j = 1; j < n; j++) { for (int k = 1; k < n; k++) { mat[j][k] = mat[j - 1][k] + mat[j][k - 1]; } } What is the value of mat[2][2] after the code segment has completed execution?

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
